categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hereafel was a female Human who served as an officer in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, she was stationed at the Imperial Garrison, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to Imperial forces.
Hereafel appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
